description: This file defines the GetClustersInfoRequest class, which extends DeviceRequest, and includes a method to execute the request on a MockZigbeeDevice by retrieving endpoint information and sending a response.

classes.name: GetClustersInfoRequest
classes.description: Represents a request to get cluster information from a Zigbee device, including implementing execution logic to retrieve endpoint data and send back cluster IDs.

methods.name: GetClustersInfoRequest
methods.description: Constructor initializing request ID, EUI64, and endpoint ID.

methods.name: executeDeviceRequest
methods.description: Executes the request on a given MockZigbeeDevice instance, retrieves the endpoint, and sends a response with cluster IDs and profile info.
